title: Science Job Competency Enhancement Program Based on Distance and Online Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic scientific theories and fundamental job-related terminology
context.additional_context: Providing an accessible smartphone-based learning environment for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, combining online theoretical learning with offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners complete interaction-based problem-solving activities with peers using online collaboration tools at a rate of over 80%.
Learners achieve over 90% success in establishing and executing weekly learning plans by applying self-regulated learning strategies.
Learners improve their understanding of scientific concepts by 40% compared to pre-assessments using multimedia learning materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
